content: Scan the provided QR code using your authenticator app. Alternatively, manually enter the given secret key into your app: <1>{{ secretKey }}</1>.

comment.text: This text provides instructions to the user on how to connect their authenticator app, either by scanning a QR code or manually entering a secret key. It appears within a description area on the TFA Activation page, guiding users through the authentication setup process. Translators should ensure the instructions are clear and accurate for both methods.

usage.context: {t("ConnectApp")}
